name: @moonsong-labs/moonwall-monorepo
description: Testing framework for the Moon family of projects

scripts.build: bun run --filter "@moonwall/types" build && bun run --filter "@moonwall/util" build && bun run --filter  "@moonwall/cli" build
scripts.generate-types: bun run --filter "@moonwall/cli" generate-types && bun run --filter "@moonwall/types" generate-types && bun run --filter "@moonwall/util" generate-types
scripts.fmt: biome format ./biome.json; bun run --filter "@moonwall/cli" fmt && bun run --filter "@moonwall/types" fmt && bun run --filter "@moonwall/util" fmt
scripts.fmt:fix: biome format ./biome.json --write; bun run --filter "@moonwall/cli" fmt:fix && bun run --filter "@moonwall/types" fmt:fix && bun run --filter "@moonwall/util" fmt:fix
scripts.lint: bun run --filter "@moonwall/cli" lint && bun run --filter "@moonwall/types" lint && bun run --filter "@moonwall/util" lint
scripts.lint:fix: bun run --filter "@moonwall/cli" lint:fix && bun run --filter "@moonwall/types" lint:fix && bun run --filter "@moonwall/util" lint:fix
scripts.clean-all: rm -rf node_modules test/node_modules && bun run --filter "@moonwall/cli" clean && bun run --filter "@moonwall/types" clean && bun run --filter "@moonwall/util" clean
scripts.pristine-build: bun clean-all && bun install --linker=isolated  && bun build && bun generate-types
scripts.test: cd test && bun moonwall test dev_multi
scripts.typecheck: bun run --filter "@moonwall/cli" typecheck && bun run --filter "@moonwall/types" typecheck && bun run --filter "@moonwall/util" typecheck
